sourcesContent:
import {
    ThemeProvider,
    CSSReset,
    Box
} from '@chakra-ui/core'

const Container = props => {
    return (
        <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
            <CSSReset />
            <Box as='main'>
                <Box
                    as='div'
                    w='100%'
                    maxW='70%'
                    mt='2px'
                    mx='auto'
                    bg='white'
                    minH='100vh'
                    boxShadow='0 -1px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.05), 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.1), 0 10px 30px #f3ece8'
                    borderRadius='4px 4px 0 0'
                    position='relative'
                    className='nav-page'
                >
                    {props.children}
                </Box>
            </Box>
        </ThemeProvider>
    )
}
export default Container
